alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 3:04PM CST until January 09 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Dallas County in south central Alabama... * Until 400 PM CST. * At 304 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Dannelly Reservoir, or 7 miles north of Camden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dannelly Reservoir, Carlowville, Minter and Tilden. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for south central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
